name: V1.0.1
content: – Fixed a bug when meteor counter didn't reset after restart.

name: V1.1
content:
– Added The Ship upgrade which can be achieved by destroying 50 meteors.

– Upgrade increases player speed, laser capacity, recharge speed and decreases reload time.

– Meteor spawn speed was slightly adjusted.

name: V1.1.5
content:
– Added proper main menu along with the Changes tab (YOU ARE HERE :D).

– Slightly improved Game Over screen.
